review.body: Check out my review on KQED: http://ww2.kqed.org/arts/2016/03/16/r...

كتاب مخيب للامال

جلست وانا انتظر لساعات طوال ان ينتهي ذلك السيل من السرد الممل دون فائدة
لقد كان هذا الكتاب اشبه ما يكون بخطبة جمعة
دبجت فيها ايات الثناء مع تقرير لشمائل وفضائل الشيخين


لا انكر هنا فضل الصحابيين
لكني اخترت قراءة هذا الكتاب لغاية اخرى
وجدتها في كتابين سابقين لطه حسين
غاية تكمن في النقد وا...
You'll think it is cheesy (heaving bosoms and shifting petticoats, embarrassing dialogue...) - and then you can't put it down!
This Book made me die, because it was soooo Perfect
Blech...and yet, I can't help myself....onto the next book!

My original Salvation audiobook review and many others can be found at Audiobook Reviewer.

Salvation is the second novella in the series called Keepers of Hell by Danielle James. Ash’ fortunes have turned. After spending years being under the control of a demon, Ash now has all the power. But thes...

review.body: The whole novel so good but the ending not as wrapped up as I'd hoped.

I wanted to write this review last night, right after I finished this book.

But I couldn't.

...

I was too busy laughing. LOL.

I loved this.

Omg, seriously, Alexa Riley, why do you so get me?

I think imma go buy it now.
Zero stars people - zero!!! But I bought the next book! Figure that one out lololol

Written by a 'woman of faith' for over 40 years,it offers clear biblical insight, teaching and personal examples of God's plan for us to be strong and live lon...
the ending was interesting. As too much of my life has been spent living with alcoholism and the behaviors I had a hard time with the alcoholic behavior in the book. other than that it was good.

I was given this book for an honest review.

4 stars

book.title: The Angel Court Affair (Charlotte & Thomas Pitt, #30)

review.body: Contrived rather unconvincingly. Motivations of the characters aren't always reasonable.
This book foreshadows and summarizes events from another book from the incarnations of immortality. The devil was more godlike than god himself.
Short and sweet scifi novel. Many good moments packed into this little book.

book.title: Hell Freezes Over - A Quincy Harker, Demon Hunter Novella

review.body:
Hartness just keeps getting better

John's best writing to date. Why Hollywood or the networks haven't grabbed up his work is beyond me. The action is tight and well written, on par with anything Whedon ever did. His sub plots are Chandleresque without being too much of a ripoff. And while there is...
interesting and quick, fun read
